mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.cat_name FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no WHERE B_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_key}, '%') ORDER BY b_write_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_key}, '%') OR nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_key}, '%')

SELECT case when GROUPING(c.cat_name)=1 then '합계' ELSE c.cat_name END AS cat_name, COUNT(*) cntweek FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN CATEGORY c ON b.cat_no=c.cat_no WHERE b.b_write_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW() GROUP BY c.cat_name WITH ROLLUP ORDER BY cat_name
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE b_no in #{b_no}
DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE member_no in #{member_no}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(join_date, '%Y-%m') months, COUNT(*) count FROM MEMBER WHERE join_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 YEAR) AND NOW() GROUP BY months ORDER BY months

SELECT a.*, b.nickname reporter FROM (SELECT m.nickname reported, r.* FROM REPORT r INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON m.member_no=r.member_no) a INNER JOIN (SELECT r.report_member, m.nickname, r.report_no FROM REPORT r INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON m.member_no=r.report_member) b ON a.report_no = b.report_no
